title: Audit Data Backup and Recovery
description: An IT auditor tests the company's data backup and recovery process.

tasks.description: Review the backup policy to understand the required frequency and retention period for backups.
tasks.expected_outcome: Auditor understands the backup requirements (e.g., daily backups, retained for 30 days).

tasks.description: Review the backup job logs for the last month to verify that backups of critical servers completed successfully every day.
tasks.expected_outcome: Auditor finds that the backup job for a critical database server has been failing intermittently.

tasks.description: Request that the IT team perform a test restore of a specific file from a recent backup to ensure the backups are viable.
tasks.expected_outcome: The IT team successfully restores the requested file, confirming the backups are working.
